name: Kat Attak
description:
A cat-based, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, that supports up to 4-player co-op!  Pledge fealty to Kat Buddha to gain special abilities and destroy the bird menace.

Art by PixelMuzings (https://www.facebook.com/PixelMuZings/)

Chiptune music by Rusticated (https://soundcloud.com/rusticated)

CC0 assets taken from OpenGameArt.org
